level.heading: TIMES AND PLACE OF SALE (ยง 30-307)

level.text: Each agent shall make all current lottery tickets available for sale to the public at all times during normal hours of operation.
Each Distribution Center shall make current lottery tickets available for distribution to agents at all times during normal business hours.
An agent shall sell lottery tickets only at the location set forth in the license.
A Distribution Center shall distribute lottery tickets only at the location set forth in the license.
The Executive Director may waive the requirements of ยง307.1, upon a determination that the waiver is in the best interests of the agency.
The waiver contemplated by ยง307.5 shall only be granted upon a written determination by the Executive Director that it is likely to do one of the following:
Increase the efficiency of the lottery; or
Generate lottery sales which otherwise would not occur.
A waiver may also be granted for similar good cause, and shall also effect a waiver of ยง308.1(b).
